file_content.text: [You search the Alde library, sifting through countless records, until you stumble on something of interest, the record of an engagement party...]
I thank you all for gathering here. Friends, family. Everyone.
As you know, this is the day that Rehanna and I were to announce our intentions to be married.
I'm sorry, Rehanna, but I've had--I mean there's been, there's been a change.
I have a responsibility to the Jedi Order. I have decided to continue with my training in the Force, offworld.
It's your family, isn't it? They talked you out of this!
Damn Organas think you're too good for us, for my daughter! You'd better be sorry. You will be sorry.
